name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-total-balance
title: Total Balance
description: Displays the total balance for a user across point types with customization options.

user_id.description: User ID to fetch the balance for. Use 'current' for the current user.

types.description: Point types to include in the total balance calculation. Use 'all' for all point types.

raw.description: Return the raw amount without any formatting or HTML elements.

total.description: Include a total balance display in the output.
